ValidationRule.description: Created for YODA. Fields that are required for the "Propose" stage of Opportunities in the "Product" record type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT( $Setup.Bypass_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rules__c ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Product', ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Propose / Quote'), /* ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),'Propose / Quote'), */ OR (
ISPICKVAL(Competition_Positioning__c,""), ISBLANK( RFQ_Received_Date__c), ISBLANK(Application__c), ISBLANK(Category_of_Interest__c), ISBLANK( End_User__c), ISBLANK(Amount) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Competition Positioning, RFQ Received Date and Application are mandatory fields to move to Propose/Quote stage
